sentences.sentence: 'Fox & Friends' host returns with another recipe from 'The Happy in a Hurry Cookbook'Thanksgiving is less than a week away and if you're looking for a way to make your table really special, add a pound of bacon and a turkey breast to your shopping list and make thisfantasticrecipe from the holiday chapter of our  "The Happy in a Hurry Cookbook, 100-Plus Fast and Easy New Recipes That Taste Like Home.

"The good thing about this recipe is that everybody is looking for a smaller Thanksgiving feast which means a smaller turkey this year.Like everything else during the pandemic, we're putting a little something extra into what we do and if you're going to make a turkey, even if it's just for two, it's got to be terrific.Life is too short to have a tough turkey.And braided with bacon and smoked for a couple of hours this one is off the charts!Honestly, we've all run out of things to cook during the pandemic.

If you're looking for something different, perhaps as a gift for a friend or loved one this holiday season, there are 100+ new easy and delicious ideas in our "Happy in a Hurry Cookbook,"click here to order.
STEVE DOOCYSteve Doocy currently serves as co-host of FOX News Channel's (FNC)FOX & Friends(weekdays 6-9AM/ET) alongside Ainsley Earhardt and Brian Kilmeade.

documents.result_message: Our detector is highly confident that the text is written entirely by a human.
documents.inputText: 'Fox & Friends' host returns with another recipe from 'The Happy in a Hurry Cookbook'Thanksgiving is less than a week away and if you’re looking for a way to make your table really special, add a pound of bacon and a turkey breast to your shopping list and make thisfantasticrecipe from the holiday chapter of our  "The Happy in a Hurry Cookbook, 100-Plus Fast and Easy New Recipes That Taste Like Home."The good thing about this recipe is that everybody is looking for a smaller Thanksgiving feast which means a smaller turkey this year.Like everything else during the pandemic, we’re putting a little something extra into what we do and if you're going to make a turkey, even if it’s just for two, it’s got to be terrific.Life is too short to have a tough turkey.And braided with bacon and smoked for a couple of hours this one is off the charts!Honestly, we’ve all run out of things to cook during the pandemic. If you’re looking for something different, perhaps as a gift for a friend or loved one this holiday season, there are 100+ new easy and delicious ideas in our "Happy in a Hurry Cookbook,"click here to order. STEVE DOOCYSteve Doocy currently serves as co-host of FOX News Channel's (FNC)FOX & Friends(weekdays 6-9AM/ET) alongside Ainsley Earhardt and Brian Kilmeade.
